roleset.name: to present with a bias
roleset.note: WEIGHT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls equip-13.4.2-1-1. (from weight.01-v)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: At the very least , [the odds]-1 are heavily weighted [*-1]against the prospects of [*] preventing the Khmer Rouge and Cambodia 's communists from [*-2] ultimately moving against their opponents .
example.arg: against the prospects of [*] preventing the Khmer Rouge and Cambodia 's communists from [*-2]ultimately moving against their opponents

example.name: with adverbials
example.text: [Responses]-1 were weighted [*-1]on the basis of age and gender [*-1] to conform with U.S. Census data .
example.arg: on the basis of age and gender
[*-1] to conform with U.S. Census data
